```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
LE <- read.csv("learn_set.csv", na.strings = c("?"))
LE <- LE[,-1] #removal of indices
```

```{r}

require(pls)
set.seed (1000)

pcr_model <- pcr(critical_temp~., data = LE, scale = TRUE, validation = "CV")
```


```{r}
summary(pcr_model)
validationplot(pcr_model)
```
